documents.document: So I go, Maybe Cheetoh Jesus meant he'd bring him back to life so his accomplishments would be better known.

So I go, Cheetoh Jesus ain't afraid of anything. Except refugees. And stairs. And ramps. And horses.

So I go, Batshit crazy, fantastically ignorant, or moronically stupid. Why not all three?

So I go, I didn't say I want a grizzly bear. I said I wanted access to a grizzly bear.
Whew, got through another day of teaching without a grizzly bear attack. This only happens, like, every day.
Have to teach today. Hope I don't face one these dreaded grizzly bear attacks.

Had this weird feeling like I was a really rich president who had a cheesy, awful, low rent inauguration.
